text: Princess Eugenie shows off her stunning engagement ring in official portraits By Sharnaz Shahid Princess Eugenie and her new fianc√© Jack Brooksbank are the subjects of new portraits taken by photographer Jonathan Brady and released by Buckingham Palace. In one picture, the 27 - year - old shows off her dazzling engagement ring as the beaming couple embraces. The eye - catching ring features a unique padparadscha sapphire surrounded by diamonds. The photos, which were taken in the Picture Gallery at Buckingham Palace, come just moments after Eugenie's parents, the Duke and Duchess of York, confirmed the news in a statement, which read : ` ` The Duke and Duchess of York are delighted to announce the engagement of Princess Eugenie to Mr Jack Brooksbank.
